Headline: Pink Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are running with wait times of up to 60 minutes; we're working to restore service. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are running, but with extended wait times. Some riders may experience wait times of up to 60 minutes while our crews work to restore regular service levels.

Use trackers to look for live arrival information and consider available alternatives, such a local bus routes or buses to/from other 'L' lines.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#21 Cermak

#9 Ashland

Allow extra travel time.
